DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial ass effect weight loss functional status lean muscle mass frail , obese old adult ( > /= 60 ) participate 6 month weight reduction intervention . Participants randomize one two study arm : Weight Loss Control : ( n = 25 ) subject follow calorie-reduction diet weight loss ≥10 % ; Weight Loss-High Protein : ( n = 50 ) subject follow calorie-reduction diet weight loss ≥10 % , high proportion high quality protein meal . Intakes > 30g high quality protein achieve three time day subject group , predominantly animal source 60-70 % animal protein beef . Subject criterion include obese ( > 30 kg/m2 ) old adult ( > 60 yr . ) mild moderate functional impairment ( Short Physical Performance Battery ; SPPB score > /= 4 )
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Eating , Activity Strength : Understanding Response -Using Protein
DOC.criteria: Age 60+ yr . BMI > 30 kg/m2 Body weight < 495 lb . Normal blood chemistry Normal renal function Primary care physician acknowledgement NonVegetarian Mild moderate movement impairment Body weight > 495 pound . Current smoker . Presence unstable , acutely symptomatic , lifelimiting illness . Positive screen dementia use MiniCog evaluation tool . Neurological condition cause functional cognitive impairment . History significant weight instability ( define > 10 pound weight gain loss 6 month prior study participation ) . Unwillingness inability randomize one two intervention group , submit study test continuously participate randomly assign lifestyle intervention program six month . Inability walk independently . Bilateral hip replacement . Unable give consent . Unable complete write record form include journal eat exercise behavior . Current use follow medication : monoamine oxidase inhibitor , prescription weight loss medication . Primary Care Physician advise participation .
